name: Aurora Klay
additional_notices: The smart-contract owner can mint new tokens, please proceed with caution.

description.en:
What is the project about?
Blockchain DApp and Novel Mercury Platform

What makes your project unique?
Active participation in the Aurora klay ecosystem (chat, SNS) ARA token reward

History of your project.
on September 14, 2022

What’s next for your project?
short-term roadmap
2Q: DAO function and ARA single staking function,
3Q:aurory NFT 2nd Minting
4Q: mobile APP launch

What can your token be used for?
It is used for payment and settlement and governance within the auroraklay ecosystem.
